meanings.sent1: The unspoke agreement between them was understood without words.
meanings.sent2: The unspoke rule was to always be kind to others.
meanings.sent3: The unspoke understanding between the siblings was that they would always have each other's backs.
meanings.sent4: The unspoke tension in the room was palpable, even though no one said a word.
meanings.sent5: The unspoke promise to always remember each other was etched in their hearts.

meanings.sent1: She unspoke during the meeting, choosing to listen instead.
meanings.sent2: He unspoke about his feelings, keeping them bottled up inside.
meanings.sent3: The cat unspoke when asked who knocked over the vase, avoiding eye contact.
meanings.sent4: The wind unspoke through the trees, rustling the leaves in a gentle whisper.
meanings.sent5: The stars unspoke their secrets to the night sky, shining brightly above.
